Boulder Colorado God has spoken again we

beyond your estimation beyond your

throughout the universe the greater
community of life and what you live we

born of the creator of all the

humanity for the salvation of the world
we are the ones whom you cannot
understand but we are the source in the
medium of what humanity must recognize
and do on its own behalf what it must
see what it has not seen what it must
know what it has not known what it must
do what it has not done this is the

receive the greatest revelation it has
ever been given to the human family to

change a change it will bring great

see the opportunity
to take advantage of a weak and

and indulgence the message is too big to

as an individual here to do in the world
now which is far different from what you

the steps to knowledge that you may know
of a deeper mind that God has placed
within you to guide you in an
increasingly perilous world great
upheaval will now occur and is beginning
to occur natural disasters born of
humanity's ignorance and overuse and

only God knows what is coming and we

enough to occupy you for the rest of

from the universe around you hear this
then not with your ideas your beliefs or

know and to act with greater certainty
our words are not for speculation or

foolish who cannot hear and cannot see
you are terrified of the revelation for

the revelation for it will change your
life
it is your conflict of mind that blinds

it is the purposes that run counter to

you cannot worship us you will not know

do not prostrate yourself to the Creator

there is no time for this now the fate

the condition of the world the condition

this is embedded in all the teachings of

struggle against this and you struggle

this is what must be recognized now God

humanity is emerging into a greater

because others are here to seek

and their beliefs
so the peoples do not see the nations do

we are those that God is sent to oversee

to sound the warnings to provide the

can prepare
adapt and create in a new world in a new

such a revelation been given to the
human family thought was not needed you
have created a civilization the world
fractured and divided in it yes but it
is a civilization you have become
increasingly interdependent between your
nations and cultures this was the

you must face the next great threshold a

stability a world of diminishing food

conditions of the world for this you
need the new revelation the past

thresholds that are now upon you and

that is why the revelation has been
given for humanity now needs to be
advised and warned blessed and given the
preparation for a future that will be
unlike the past hear these words not
with your intellect but with your heart
they speak to a greater truth within you
a greater truth beyond concepts beliefs
and ideas they speak to a natural
resonance within you a natural affinity
a natural inclination a natural
direction that lives within you every
moment beyond the realm on the reach of

ideas your beliefs in your activities as
they exist today you are unprepared
God has sent the preparation you are
unaware God is providing the awareness
you are uncertain God is calling you to
the center of certainty within yourself
you are conflicted God is providing the
pathway out of conflict you are self
demeaning and demeaning of others God is
restoring to your true value and purpose
in the world the world is changing but
you do not see God has given you the
eyes to see in the ears to hear but they
are different from what you do today and
what you understand today humanity will
fail without the new revelation the
world will become ever darker more
dangerous and conflicted without the
revelation humanity will falter and fail
in the face of its own errors and lack
of clarity the resources of the world
will spent through conflict competition
and war people will rise up against
their governments people will rise up

continuous than anything you have seen
before it is the new revelation that
holds the missing ingredient to your
understanding the key to your awareness
and the source of your power strength
and determination for this you must have
a serious mind take your life seriously
and begin to attend to the greater needs
and requirements of your life that is
why God has sent the revelation this is
the revelation we are the revelation
there are no heroes to worship now no
individuals to deify only greater
responsibilities be assumed and a
greater wisdom be utilized there is no
escape through personal enlightenment
there is no running away there is no
self-deception there is only greater
resonance and responsibility greater
sacrifice and contribution that is what
will save the world that is what will
save humanity's freedom and
self-determination in the universe where
freedom is rare and must be protected
very carefully this is what will restore
dignity to the individual and the
ability to contribute something of
greater power and significance no matter

words not with your ideas your
believe so your contention but with your
heart your deeper nature for God can
only speak to what God has created in
you God did not create your social
personality God did not create your
ideas and beliefs God did not create
your decisions your failures and your
regrets God can only speak to what God
created in you which is something deeper
more pervasive and more natural within
you the new message is calling to you
once you become aware of it then you
must face the challenge of recognition
and what this will mean for your life
people reject the revelation because
they do not want to change they do not

their ideas and their position in
society they cannot dispute the new

except on spurious grounds here you will

will where do they really want to be
themselves their situations in the world

before here you will see the intellect
parading as a kind of God when in fact

in a self deceptive form that so many

you cannot have everything you cannot

were meant to live and that you're not
